review: I love the Firestick! So easy to use, works great.
author: kimber

review: It's easy to use and doesn't interfere with clarity.
author: Florence Jacobson

review: Very easy to install. Quality seems to be good. Tutorial was very helpful.
author: joanlucy

review: Totally in love with this stick!! Going to make my vacation less boring at night when relaxing!!! 👍👍
author: Michele Newhouse

review: Easy setup, great price, very responsive remote allows you to move around quickly - great buy !
author: Christine Moosher

review: Fast easy and cheap!Only downside is The number of things it can do makes it more complicated than id like to when we usually go straight to Netflix. It's interface is snappy fast so it's not like it adds much time to the startup, Just more button clicks/navigation.
author: Jim Weir

review: I love our new fire TV stick. My son-in-law set it up in 5 minutes. I find that it is easy to use and offers many more options to our TV viewing.
author: Bikini Cat

review: I was able to easily install the fire stick on my non-smart tv.  I am looking forward to having Nexflix available on same.  I was disappointed in the remote provided with this package.  After pushing and pulling on the cover of same,  I called amazon and was told to pry off with a butter knife.  This seems to me to be a shoddy design.  They could have at least put this in the instructions.
author: panfish1

review: We love the fact that our TV is now a smart TV.
author: Lisa Sawyer "bookworm"
